Title: Regaining the Trail
Text:
Elladan is at his camp of Thorenhad just north of the road following the North-western fork out of Rivendell.

Lord Glorfindel has sent you back to Elladan with a beryl, an Elf-stone that glows when it comes near places on which great evil has left its mark.
CompleteText: The words of Lord Glorfindel are most wise, and his gift of this beryl gives some hope that we may be able to regain the trail of this missing Nazgûl. You have my thanks, @p, but now I must determine where we are to bring the beryl in order to reveal the Nazgûl's location!
